name: Adobe Photoshop 2024
description: Professional photo editing and graphic design software with advanced features for creative professionals. Includes AI-powered tools, advanced compositing, and comprehensive photo manipulation capabilities.

name: Microsoft Office 365
description: Complete office suite with Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and more. Cloud-based collaboration tools and 1TB OneDrive storage included. Perfect for business and personal use.

name: Visual Studio Code Pro
description: Advanced code editor with premium features including advanced debugging, IntelliSense, Git integration, and extensive plugin support. Ideal for professional developers.

name: Norton Antivirus
description: Complete antivirus and internet security suite with real-time protection, firewall, VPN, and identity theft protection. Protects multiple devices and platforms.

name: Adobe Illustrator 2024
description: Vector graphics and illustration software for creating logos, icons, drawings, typography, and illustrations. Industry-standard tool for graphic designers and artists.

name: IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate
description: Powerful IDE for Java and other languages with intelligent coding assistance, built-in tools, and framework support. Perfect for enterprise development projects.

name: Slack Business+
description: Advanced team collaboration platform with unlimited message history, guest access, video calls, and enterprise-grade security features.

name: Kaspersky Total Security
description: Multi-device security solution with antivirus, anti-phishing, secure VPN, password manager, and parental controls. Comprehensive protection for all your devices.

name: Figma Professional
description: Collaborative interface design tool with real-time collaboration, prototyping, and design systems. Perfect for UI/UX designers and design teams.

name: Docker Desktop Pro
description: Professional containerization platform with advanced features for development teams. Includes enhanced security, centralized management, and enterprise support.
